EmailTemplate.subject: Understanding the latest cyberthreats is your first line of defense
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Empower your new energy future Understanding the latest cyberthreats is your first line of defense Cyber criminals are targeting power utilities and vulnerable IoT devices with increasingly sophisticated malware attacks. A successful attack could put your grid operations and business at risk. Read our 2019 Threat Intelligence Report <[[https://pages.nokia.com/t003b6-threat-intelligence-report-2019.html?did=d000000001hj&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email2-threatreport&utm_term=power-util]]> for detailed analysis and insights that will help you understand how cyber criminals around the world are using malware to target you and your customers. Find out how to empower your power utility for the new energy future https://networks.nokia.com/empowered <[[https://networks.nokia.com/empowered?did=d000000001hj&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email2-threatreport&utm_term=power-util]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
